me.description: My name is Guillermo, and I love ideating and building stuff.

content.1: I'm a Full-Stack Engineer specialized in React, TypeScript, and Laravel.
content.2: I've cultivated a strong product mindset by engaging with stakeholders and participating in every aspect of the development life cycle.

1.header: Want to read about my journey?
1.content: Click START to see how I became a Software Engineer üíª

2.content: It starts in the '90s, when my parents buy our first computer, becoming a core part of my activities and entertainment. As I grow up - and start playing videogames - I start building my own custom computers and scripts.

3.content: This was my first big failure as I didn't complete my Telecom degree - only ~50% of it -. However, this experience helped me identify my weaknesses and laid the groundwork for what my career would become in the future.

4.content: I decided to pursue a career in Software Development, so I planned carefully my next steps: I became a self-taught developer, worked part-time as an IT technician, and got a degree in Cross-platform Software Development.

5.content: I secured an intership in an Edinburgh-based consultancy, so I decided to leave my confort zone and devoted myself to making the most out of this experience. It was my first working experience in Web Development.

6.content: I became part of an awesome team that helped me grow both personally and professionally. This experience also helped me develop a product and user-first mindset through an active participation in every step of the software development life cycle.

7.content: I decided to take some time off to work on some personal projects - like this site! - and do some personal development. Whatever challenge comes next, I'm looking forward to it and to share my learnings here. Stay tuned!

skills.description: Through my journey, I've developed a varied set of skills that have been useful for the many tasks I've accomplished in the past. They also serve as the base of the new skills that I keep working on in order to become an specialized generalist.

traits.description: I consider myself a calm and friendly person that always see the good in people. I don't like to jump into conclussions quickly and enjoy debating ideas in order to learn more about how others think. A bit of a shy extrovert, I'm comfortable in small groups but I can get nervous in front of bigger audiences; however, that's never stopped me from sharing my ideas. In a team environment, I enjoy helping others and making sure newcomers feel welcomed.
